Html: Some times when i try to get entity (eg Selection.ShapeRange), i have exception target of invocation. How can i check for entity is available for get?

please explaine what means "sometimes". at the moment, its impossible for me to pin point the problem. it looks like you have no selection sometimes. in this case the com server(office) returns an error(HResult) and the .net runtime system throws the corresonding exception.

Hi!
